name: rss-reader
description: Feedly風のRSSリーダーアプリケーション

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && uv run black app/ tests/ && uv run isort app/ tests/ && uv run flake8 app/ tests/ && uv run mypy app/
scripts.install:all: cd backend && uv sync && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../infrastructure && npm install
